name: Wabubu in Fungi Land
description:
Wabubu in Fungi Land!

Make your way through the five levels of this Original Gameboy themed platformer.

Input:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move.

A = J or Z

B = K or X

You can keep 'A' pressed to plane!

You can press 'B' to fire your goodies!

Final level tips:

The giant mushroom will fire a laser at you. After some shots, he'll close his eye and fly down. At this right moment you can jump on it's head to damage him.
